{{Expand French|Pohénégamook|date=December 2018}} {{Infobox settlement |name = Pohénégamook |official_name = |native_name = |settlement_type = [[City (Quebec)|City]] |image_skyline = lac-pohenegamook2.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption = Pohenegamook Lake |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_size = |nickname = |motto = |image_map = Pohénégamook Quebec location diagram.png |mapsize = |map_caption = Location within Témiscouata RCM |pushpin_map = Canada Eastern Quebec |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_label = |pushpin_map_caption = Location in eastern Quebec |coordinates = {{coord|47|28|N|69|13|W|region:CA-QC|display=inline,title}} |coor_pinpoint = |coordinates_footnotes = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{CAN}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces and territories of Canada|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = {{QC}} |subdivision_type2 = [[Region (Quebec)|Region]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Bas-Saint-Laurent]] |subdivision_type3 = [[Regional county municipality|RCM]] |subdivision_name3 = [[Témiscouata Regional County Municipality|Témiscouata]] |subdivision_type4 = |subdivision_name4 = |established_title = |established_date = |established_title1 = Constituted |established_date1 = November 3, 1973 |established_title2 = |established_date2 = |established_title3 = |established_date3 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = Louise Labonté |leader_title1 = [[List of Canadian federal electoral districts|Federal riding]] |leader_name1 = [[Rimouski-Neigette—Témiscouata—Les Basques|Rimouski-Neigette—
Témiscouata—Les Basques]] |leader_title2 = [[List of Quebec provincial electoral districts|Prov. riding]] |leader_name2 = [[Rivière-du-Loup-Témiscouata (provincial electoral district)|Rivière-du-Loup-Témiscouata]] |leader_title3 = |leader_name3 = |leader_title4 = |leader_name4 = |area_footnotes = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 349.40 |area_land_km2 = 340.33 |area_water_km2 = |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |population_footnotes = |population_total = 2770 |population_as_of = [[Canada 2011 Census|2011]] |population_density_km2 = 8.1 |population_blank1_title= Pop 2006-2011 |population_blank1 = {{decrease}} 5.8% |population_blank2_title= Dwellings |population_blank2 = 1383 |population_note = |timezone = [[Eastern Time Zone|EST]] |utc_offset = −5 |timezone_DST = [[Eastern Time Zone|EDT]] |utc_offset_DST = −4 |postal_code_type = [[Canadian postal code|Postal code(s)]] |postal_code = [[List of G postal codes of Canada|G0L 1J0]] |area_code = [[Area codes 418 and 581|418 and 581]] |blank_name = Highways |blank_info = {{jct|state=QC|QC|289}} |website = {{URL|www.pohenegamook.net}} |footnotes = }} '''Pohénégamook''', Quebec (pop. 2940) is a [[Canada|Canadian]] town on the [[Canada–United States border]] in [[Quebec]]'s [[Témiscouata Regional County Municipality]]. The town shares the border with [[Estcourt Station, Maine|Estcourt Station]], [[Maine]], the northernmost point in [[New England]]. As of 2006, Pohénégamook had 2940 people, down 5.1% from the last census in 2001. The town is named after [[Lake Pohenegamook]] and is located on the lake's southern and western shores. Pohénégamook was amalgamated with the formerly-independent communities of Saint-Pierre d'Estcourt, Saint-Éleuthère, Village-Blier and Saint-David-de-Sully on October 23, 1973. ==See also== * [[Lake Pohenegamook]], a waterbody * [[Boucanée River]], a stream * [[List of cities in Quebec]] ==References== {{Reflist|refs= {{SCref |unit=csd |code=2413095}} {{mamrot |type=municipalite |13095}} {{toponymie |50039}} }} ==External links== * {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.pohenegamook.net http://www.pohenegamook.net (Pohenegamook official website)] {{Geographic location | Centre = Pohénégamook | NE = [[Saint-Honoré-de-Témiscouata, Quebec|Saint-Honoré-de-Témiscouata]] | E = [[Saint-Elzéar-de-Témiscouata, Quebec|Saint-Elzéar-de-Témiscouata]] | SE = [[Rivière-Bleue, Quebec|Rivière-Bleue]] | S = {{flagicon|USA}} [[Northwest Aroostook, Maine]] | SW = [[Saint-Athanase, Quebec|Saint-Athanase]] | NW = [[Picard, Quebec|Picard]] }} {{Témiscouata RCM|state=expanded}} {{Saint John River}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pohenegamook}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Quebec]] [[Category:Incorporated places in Bas-Saint-Laurent]] {{BasSaintLaurent-geo-stub}}
